metadata.title: CVE-2024-47796 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the nowindowfunctionality of OFFIS DCMTK 3.6.8. A specially crafted DICOM file can leadto an out-of-bounds write. An attacker can provide a malicious file totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
